title: Authorizes commissioner of health to issue copies of death certificates for genealogical purposes
summary: Authorizes the commissioner of health to issue copies and transcripts of death certificates, which do not include the cause of death or medical certifications, for genealogical and research purposes.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          173

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. CAHILL, SCHIMMINGER -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M.
         of A. McENENY -- read once and referred to the Committee on Health

       AN ACT to amend the public health law, in  relation  to  issuance  of  a
         record of death for genealogical or research purposes

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 1 of section 4174 of the public health  law  is
    2  amended by adding a new paragraph (a-1) to read as follows:
    3    (A-1)  UPON  REQUEST,  ISSUE  TO  ANY  APPLICANT,  FOR GENEALOGICAL OR
    4  RESEARCH PURPOSES, A COPY OR TRANSCRIPT  OF  THE  RECORD  OF  ANY  DEATH
    5  REGISTERED UNDER THE PROVISIONS OF THIS CHAPTER, WHICH SHALL NOT INCLUDE
    6  THEREIN THE CAUSE OF DEATH OF THE DECEDENT NOR THE MEDICAL CERTIFICATE;
    7    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01082-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to issuance of a record of death for genealogical or research purposes
